snp2.13:360:
360 "Yassa maṅgalā samūhatā,
 Uppātā supinā ca lakkhaṇā ca;
So maṅgaladosavippahīno,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:361:
361
Rāgaṁ vinayetha mānusesu, Dibbesu kāmesu cāpi bhikkhu;
Atikkamma bhavaṁ samecca dhammaṁ,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:362:
362
Vipiṭṭhikatvāna pesuṇāni, Kodhaṁ kadarīyaṁ jaheyya bhikkhu;
Anurodhavirodhavippahīno,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:363:
363
Hitvāna piyañca appiyañca, Anupādāya anissito kuhiñci;
Saṁyojaniyehi vippamutto,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:364:
364
Na so upadhīsu sārameti, Ādānesu vineyya chandarāgaṁ;
So anissito anaññaneyyo,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:365:
365
Vacasā manasā ca kammunā ca, Aviruddho sammā viditvā dhammaṁ;
Nibbānapadābhipatthayāno,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:366:
366
Yo vandati manti nunnameyya, Akkuṭṭhopi na sandhiyetha bhikkhu;
Laddhā parabhojanaṁ na majje,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:367:
367
Lobhañca bhavañca vippahāya, Virato chedanabandhanā ca bhikkhu;
So tiṇṇakathaṅkatho visallo,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:368:
368
Sāruppaṁ attano viditvā, No ca bhikkhu hiṁseyya kañci loke;
Yathātathiyaṁ viditvā dhammaṁ,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:369:
369
Yassānusayā na santi keci, Mūlā ca akusalā samūhatāse;
So nirāso anāsisāno,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:370:
370
Āsavakhīṇo pahīnamāno, Sabbaṁ rāgapathaṁ upātivatto;
Danto parinibbuto ṭhitatto,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:371:
371
Saddho sutavā niyāmadassī, Vaggagatesu na vaggasāri dhīro;
Lobhaṁ dosaṁ vineyya paṭighaṁ,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:372:
372
Saṁsuddhajino vivaṭṭacchado, Dhammesu vasī pāragū anejo;
Saṅkhāranirodhañāṇakusalo,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:373:
373
Atītesu anāgatesu cāpi, Kappātīto aticcasuddhipañño;
Sabbāyatanehi vippamutto,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
snp2.13:374:
374
Aññāya padaṁ samecca dhammaṁ, Vivaṭaṁ disvāna pahānamāsavānaṁ;
Sabbupadhīnaṁ parikkhayāno,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyya".
snp2.13:375:
375
"Addhā hi bhagavā tatheva etaṁ, Yo so evaṁvihārī danto bhikkhu;
Sabbasaṁyojanayogavītivatto,
Sammā so loke paribbajeyyā"ti.
